exception.message: The following asserts failed: url is not Matching expected [https://www.myntra.com/mens-watches?f=Categories%3AFitness%20Bands&sort=recommended] but found [https://www.myntra.com/mens-watches?f=Categories%3AFitness%20Bands%3A%3AColor%3ABlack_36454f&sort=discount], price is not Matching expected [₹2399] but found [₹1399]
